Whether the cosmetics toggle tooltip should
be shown even when cosmetics are toggled on
Location of the artifact cooldown gui element
Distance from the hotbar measured in pixels
Negative values place the element left of the hotbar
Display artifacts on cooldown next to the hotbar
Whether models for gloves are shown in first person
Whether artifacts have tooltips explaining their effects
Use modded chest textures for Mimics
Whether mimics can use textures from Lootr or Quark
Archaeology chance
The chance that an artifact generates in suspicious sand or gravel
To disable or change the effects of specific items, the /gamerule command can be used. A list of available game rules and their effects can be found on the wiki on GitHub.
Raridade do artefato
Affects how common artifacts are in chests
Values above 1 will make artifacts rarer
Values between 0 and 1 will make artifacts more common
Set this to 10000 to remove all artifacts from chest loot
Campsite
Campsite count
Amount of campsite generation attempts per chunk
Set this to 0 to prevent campsites from generating
Allow light sources
Whether campsites can contain blocks that emit lights
Maximum Y-level
The maximum height campsites can spawn at
Chance de gerar mímicos em acampamentos
Probability that a campsite contains a mimic
Minimum Y-level
The minimum height campsites can spawn at
Usar baús de mods
Whether chests from other mods generate in campsites
Entity Equipment Chance
The chance that a skeleton, zombie or piglin
spawns with an artifact equipped
Everlasting Beef chance
The chance everlasting beef drops when a cow
or mooshroom is killed by a player
Modificar sons de ferimento dos jogadores
Whether the Kitty Slippers and Bunny Hoppers
change the player's hurt sounds
